data.actual_result: Recent DMs stays at the previous position.
data.expected_result: Recent DMs list jumps back up to the top to the current conversation.
data.short_description: Recent DMs list positioning error after receiving a new message
data.steps_to_repro: - scroll down in your recent DMs and choose someone at the bottom of the list (don't message them or anything) - Open up a server - have someone DM you - Open the DM notification - the recent DMs list stays at the previous position instead of jumping to the top like it does on mobile.
